body_html:
The problem arises when assigning the optimizer variables to MyModel with setattr.
I have a similar setup in my code to aggregate all variables as currently lists of checkpointables are not possible.

body:
The problem arises when assigning the optimizer variables to MyModel with `setattr`.
I have a similar setup in my code to aggregate all variables as currently lists of checkpointables are not possible.
